ISEBE LEMICIMBI YENDALO ENGQONGILEYO NEZOTYELELO: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



IINDABA

IINTETHO

USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Injongo yeSebe leMicimbi yezokusiNgqongileyo noKhenketho kukukhokela ulawulo lokusingqongileyo nokhenketho ngokweminqweno yophuhliso olungaphelendawo, kusenzelwa wonke ubani, ngokuthi
* kukhuthazwe uphuhliso olungaphelendawo, ukusetyenziswa nokukhuselwa kwezinto zethu zendalo nenkcubeko.
* kumiselwe iinkqubo zokhenketho ezinengqiqo neziqinisekisa uzinzo kwezisingqongileyo nezinegalelo ekudalweni kwemisebenzi nomgangatho ongcono wobomi.
* ululolonga izakhono, amava kunye nolwazi ngokungqonge bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika.
* ukunyanzelisa ukufikeleka ngokobulungisa kwinzuzo efumaneka kwizinto zethu zendalo nenkcubeko
* ukuxhobisa abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngamandla, uluntu namaqumrhu ngokunjalo, oko kusenziwa ngokubambisana, iinkqubo zophando neenkonzo zengcaciso
* kusetyenziswane nabo bonke abachaphazelekayo namacandelo aseburhulumenteni ngokomoya wolawulo ololulo.
* kuqinisekiswe ukuba konke ukuthabatha inxaxheba kwezizwe ngezizwe kuqhutywa ngokwemigaqo-nkqubo nemimiselo yoMzantsi Afrika.


Imisebenzi yeli Sebe iqulunqwa kananjalo isungulwe ngamasetyana amahlanu eli sebe:
* EloLawulo lwezokusiNgqongileyo
* EloLawulo lwezaseManzini naseluNxwemeni
* EloKhenketho
* EloLawulo lweZinto eziPhilayo noLondolozo lweNdalo
* IMicimbi yeeNkonzo eziDityanelweyo


Ezinye iinkqubo neeprojekthi eli Sebe elibandakanyeka kuzo kungoku nje zezi:
* Inkqubo esalingwayo, i-Wild Coast Spatial Development Initiative Pilot Programme
* Inkongolo i-World Parks Congress
* EzoKhenketho IiProjekthi neeNkqubo zoPhuhliso lwaMashishini
* Inkqubo i-SADC Regional Environmental Education Programme
* Inkqubo yesizwe yokufundisa ngezokusingqongileyo i-National Environmental Education Programme (NEEP)
* Ukhuphiswano i-Cleanest Town Competition 2003
* Iveki i-Imbizo Focus Week
* Imimandla yolondolozo lwendalo enqamla imida
* INkqubo yokuPhungula ubuHlwempu
* Iphulo i-SA Welcome Campaign
* INkqubo yolawulo lweZinto eziLahlwayo
* Inkqubo i-World Heritage Convention Programme
* Inkqubo emalunga neProjekthi yeMo yezokusiNgqongileyo
* Amalinge okuphuhlisa iindawo ezingekabi nanto
* Ukukhathalelwa konxweme
* I-CITES(Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species), imvumelwano malunga nokurhweba kwezizwe ngezinto ezisengozini yokuphela
* I-CITES(Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species), imvumelwano malunga nokurhweba kwezizwe ngezinto ezisengozini yokuphela
